question.title: VSCode Maven for Java can't create Maven project
question.body:
When i creating project with Ctrl+Shift+P -> Java: Create Java Project -> any archetype ->... I got an error:

Executing task: "mvn org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-archetype-plugin:3.1.2:generate -DarchetypeArtifactId="maven-archetype-quickstart" -DarchetypeGroupId="org.apache.maven.archetypes" -DarchetypeVersion="1.4" -DgroupId="com.example" -DartifactId="demo""

There is a syntax error in the file name, folder name, or volume label.

and

* The terminal process "cmd.exe /c ""mvn org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-archetype-plugin:3.1.2:generate -DarchetypeArtifactId="maven-archetype-quickstart" -DarchetypeGroupId="org.apache.maven.archetypes" -DarchetypeVersion="1.4" -DgroupId="com.example" -DartifactId="demo"""" terminated with exit code: 1.

* Terminal will be reused by tasks, press any key to close it.

The problem is in the extra quotes that vscode adds for some reason

For example: mvn org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-archetype-plugin:3.1.2:generate -DarchetypeArtifactId="maven-archetype-quickstart" -DarchetypeGroupId="org.apache.maven.archetypes" -DarchetypeVersion="1.4" -DgroupId="com.example" -DartifactId="demo" - works fine

What needs to be done, what settings to change, to get rid of unnecessary quotes?
